body.p: Trac is a web based wiki and issue tracking software package that has quickly becoming a favorite amongst many open source projects. In addition to its wiki and ticketing sytem, it also includes a source code repository browser much like ViewVc. As such, eclim supports several commands to quickly navigate to some of Trac's source code tools.

ul.li: :TracLog [file] - Opens the Trac repository log url for the supplied file / directory, or current buffer if no argument supplied.
:TracAnnotate [revision] - Opens the Trac url for the current file in the annotation view for the last committed revision or the revision supplied.
:TracChangeSet [revision] - Opens the Trac url for the change set of the last committed revision of the current file or the revision supplied.
:TracDiff [revision, revision] - Opens the Trac url for the current file's revision diffed against the previous revision, the revision supplied, or a diff of the two revision numbers supplied.

org.eclim.project.trac
The root url of the Trac server you wish to use.
